name: Door Opener Pro
description:
Go through the doors as fast as you can.

Will you make it to the end? No, no you won't.

But you can still have fun trying!

Controls:

Just drag the doors open.

Thanks for playing and feel free to leave a comment below.

I'm working on more "puzzly" doors and on the graphics, though I'm not sure on what to go with as I'm not a very arts inclined person.

Also added the current source which I'll update as I progress on the development.

Notes:

V0: First prototype upload.

V1: Added models to the current doors and some sounds.

V2: Testing out a voxely look.
